node.text:
We are beyond thrilled that The Raviz Kovalam was recently commended for our excellence in quality and standards by Fit Reisen Germany - a leading provider of health and wellness travel. The prestigious "Fit Reisen Quality Certificate - 2019" is awarded to hotels with a strong service and quality orientation, and a clear focus on spa and health.

For details contact: 0471 – 3051234 | Toll Free: 1800 4252 2220 | www.theravizkovalam.com | www.theraviz.com | ayurveda@theraviz.com
